title: Did Shell's workers in Pennsylvania tell them to come to Trump's party or lose the rent?
subtitle: Several news articles on the President ' s August 2019 visit to the Petrochemical plant in Pennsylvania were discussed.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In August 2019, workers at the Shell factory in Beaver County, Pennsylvania, were either asked to attend a speech from United States President Donald Trump or to lose their wages.
